name: Sweet Voice of Death
description:
Sweet Voice of Death is a 2D Sidescroller Puzzle game, you play as Death himself, awaken once again to reap some new souls, the only way to do this, is with your gentle breeze of a voice.

Gameplay requires thinking while not being too confusing for people who aren't used to puzzle games.

(Game isn't that long, As a personal note, it helped me a lot to understand how much thinking it goes into puzzle games.)

Made for a college project (Game Jam Type)

Controls:

AD: Movement

W: Jump

Left Mouse: Voice Projectile (Requires aiming with Mouse)

Development time: 4 Days

Credits:

Martin Herrera (Maisth)

Programmer, Artist, Writing, SFX Design

Additional Credits:

AnimeIsTrash for it's incredible music.

Zapsplat for sound effects
